title: Shin Mazinger Zero vs Ankoku Daishougun
original_name: 真マジンガー ZERO vs 暗黒大将軍
sinopse: After finally defeating Dr. Hell, Kabuto Kouji has to battle the forces of the Mikene Empire. Against an enemy unknown even to Minerva X, who has seen countless alternate timelines, Mazinger Z faces his most desperate moments!
